casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Jesus Oscar TREVINO, Defendant-Appellant. No. 30691. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 19, 1971. Oscar Pena, Laredo, Tex., court-appointed, for defendant-appellant. Anthony J. P. Farris, U. S. Atty., James R. Gough, Edward B. McDon-ough, Jr., Anthony C. Aguilar, Asst. U. S. Attys., Houston, Tex., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GOLDBERG, GODBOLD and RONEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
